hackathon-description-text: This hackathon is centered around making software with ASF software. Hackers are expected to delve into the world of Apache software and enhance their skills!
hackathon-rules:
Projects will be mainly judged on use of an ASF project, along with creativity and feasibility. Hackers must also follow all guidelines outlined in the FIT student code of conduct (
) for the duration of the event.
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=150 W University Blvd, Melbourne, FL 32901, USA
hackathon-location-address: 150 W University Blvd, Melbourne, FL 32901, USA
hackathon-description-header: Creating technical solutions to everyday problems using ASF software
